segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the children in the corner.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That little boy is on a stool that looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly reaching into the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is in the jar, the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's trying to get those cookies without anyone seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, almost tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unstable it appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are truly partners in crime, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky maneuver for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a precarious situation for a cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR
